title: League display's animated screensaver's don't work for me.

So it seems that people might be a bit confuse about how screensaver works, it's not a desktop animation as i thought it was, the issue of having a black screen after finalizing have seem to be solved for me. How to get the screensaver to active is leaving your PC idle, for about a minute it took me, the animation will play, but make sure your screensaver is on League Display, typing screen saver into your search bar and you'll see "Change Screensaver" if it's not already choose League Display, number on the bottom is the time you need to wait. Now that you have changed screensaver to League Display, open League Display and select which ever one, it will look as if no changes were made but wait like a minute or so, and it should start playing. 
If you got it to play great, if not sorry, just here to clear up the confusion about the display
